text: niṅṅaḷuṭe mumpuṇṭāyirunnavareppēālettanne. niṅṅaḷekkāḷ kanatta śaktiyuḷḷavaruṁ, kūṭutal svattukkaḷuṁ santatikaḷumuḷḷavarumāyirunnu avar. aṅṅane taṅṅaḷuṭe ōharikeāṇṭ avar sukhamanubhaviccu. ennāl niṅṅaḷuṭe ā mungāmikaḷ avaruṭe ōharikeāṇṭ sukhamanubhaviccat pēāle ippēāḷ niṅṅaḷuṭe ōharikeāṇṭ niṅṅaḷuṁ sukhamanubhaviccu. avar (adharm'mattil) muḻukiyat pēāle niṅṅaḷuṁ muḻuki. attarakkāruṭe karm'maṅṅaḷ ihattiluṁ parattiluṁ niṣphalamāyirikkunnu. avar tanneyāṇ naṣṭaṁ paṟṟiyavar
